Lyric:
[by:NickyRomero]
[00:14.31]I never came to the beach, or stood by the ocean
[00:21.02]I never sat by the shore, under the sun with my feet in the sand
[00:26.85]But you brought me here and I'm happy that you did
[00:34.03]'Cause now I'm as free as birds catching the wind
[00:41.56]I always thought I would sink, so I never swam
[00:48.30]I never went boatin', don't get how they are floatin'
[00:51.80]And sometimes I get so scared of what I can't understand
[00:57.07]
[00:58.27]But here I am, next to you
[01:04.70]The sky's more blue in Malibu
[01:10.60]
[01:50.78]You would explain the current, as I just smile
[01:57.15]Hoping that you'll stay the same, and nothing will change
[02:01.46]And it'll be us, just for a while
[02:06.45]Do we even exist?
[02:09.54]That's when I make the wish, to swim away with the fish
[02:17.95]Is it supposed to be this hot all summer long?
[02:24.35]I never would've believed you if three years ago you told me
[02:29.23]I'd be here writing this song
[02:33.07]
[02:33.70]But here I am, next to you
[02:40.73]The sky's so blue in Malibu
